text:
A model will be ﬁt once on the training dataset for a given conﬁguration. We will deﬁne a
generic model fit() function to perform this operation that can be ﬁlled in for the given type
of neural network that we may be interested in later. The function takes the training dataset
and the model conﬁguration and returns the ﬁt model ready for making predictions.
# fit a model
def model_fit(train, config):
return None
Listing 14.6: Example of a function for ﬁtting a model with a conﬁguration.
